title: LS | Jagdambika Pal | The Waqf (Amendment) Bill, 2025 & The Mussalman Wakf (Repeal) Bill, 2024
description:
#budget2025 #budgetsession2025 #unionbudget2025 

Discussion on The Waqf (Amendment) Bill, 2025 & The Mussalman Wakf (Repeal) Bill, 2024. in Lok Sabha . That the Bill further to amend the Waqf Act, 1995 and  that the Bill to repeal the Mussalman Wakf Act, 1923,

Sansad Television is the Parliamentary channel of India. It was created in 2021 by merging Lok Sabha Television and Rajya Sabha Television.
